# tidylife

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tidylife is to allow analysis of demographic data using tidy tools.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tidylife from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("robjhyndman/tidylife")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(tidylife)
```

```{r fr.mort, message=FALSE}
demography::fr.mort |> as_tsibble()
```
